oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Water Works letter, 1912 October 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A piece of correspondence written on City of Nashville, Water Works Department letterhead. The names listed on the letterhead include George Reyer, Superintendent; T.H. Morton, Water Tax Assessor; T.D. Morton, Assistant Water Tax Assessor; and A.A. Doak, Draughtsman. The letter appears to be granting permission to tap into a private water main. Forms part of the Nashville Water Works Correspondence. 1 letter: col.; 8.5 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reyer, George, 1856-1932; Morton, T.H.; Morton, T.D.; Doak, A.A.
